CustomField.formula: IF( OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = "Email_Observation_Form", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Email_Observation_Form_True_Co"), (Opening_Total_Email__c + Structure_Total_Email__c + Etiquette_Total__c + Handling_Skills_Total__c + Procedures_Total_Email__c + Closing_Total_Email__c) /6, 0)
CustomField.label: Total Email Observation Score
